value.title: Quickly create Power BI reports in Power BI Service

value.title: Table.AddFuzzyClusterColumn Function in Power BI
value.excerpt: During this vLog, we will learn how we can get help with spellings in Power BI using Table.AddFuzzyClusterColumn function in Power BI. AddFuzzyClusterColumn function adds a new column with representative values obtained by fuzzy grouping values of the specified column in a table.     We will check how

value.title: 3 steps to pin Reporting Services visuals to a Power BI Dashboard

There are three main steps you have to do to get this to work.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com -- http://twitter.com/guyinacube

value.title: Download and Deploy a K12 Power BI Solution for schools

This solution includes instructions to create views for use with the Power BI reports. It also includes a Power BI Desktop template for pre-created reports based on your school data.  GitHub Repo
